preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 338.5 g of Bismuth Oxide using an analytical balance. 
 2. Measure 36.2 g of Selenium. 
 3. Measure 9.7 g of Terbium Oxide. 
 4. Combine Bismuth Oxide, Selenium, and Terbium Oxide in a ceramic or glass mixing container. 
 5. Mix thoroughly using a pestle and mortar to ensure uniform distribution of the components.
